pkgmetadata.longdescription: Dolphin is an emulator for running GameCube and Wii games on Windows, Linux, macOS, and recent Android devices.

use.flag: Use net-wireless/bluez for native Wii peripheral support
Enable automatically reporting the current game to net-im/discord-bin
Enable EGL API (OpenGL without X11, mainly for movie rendering)
Enable runtime debugging of emulated software using sys-devel/llvm
Build the emulator with analytics reporting
